name: Drive & Crash 2019: Speed Game
description:
There is an illegal race in the city and you have been waiting this moment for years. Feel the smell of gas and survive to all the dangers you are going to find in the street.

Are you brave enough for this challenge? The highway is full of traffic but you think anyone can't beat you. Are you able to show your amazing skills?

Become the king in your sport car and gain the respect in this extreme car racing game!

FEATURES OF THE GAME
- Beautiful Unlockable Cars
- 4 Game Modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Change the Weather
- Multiple funny Levels
- Daily Rewards

Hit the gas!
